group.label: Ethics approval and consent to participate
group.name: EthicsHeading

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: All women participated in the study provided written informed consent. The present study was approved by the Institutional Review Boards of the University of Miami, the Jackson Memorial Hospital, and the Wake Forest Research Base Community Clinical Oncology Programs.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
